original_text: And Jehoiada the priest gave to the captains the spears and the large and small shields that had been King David's, which were in the house of God.
korean_text: 제사장 여호야다가 하나님의 전 안에 있는 다윗 왕의 창과 큰 방패와 작은 방패를 백부장들에게 주고

sentences.original_text: And Jehoiada the priest gave to the captains
the spears and the large and small shields
which were in the house of God
